SEARCH:
Package de.presti.ree6.audio.music

Klasse TrackScheduler

java.lang.Object
com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.player.event.AudioEventAdapter
de.presti.ree6.audio.music.TrackScheduler
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.player.event.AudioEventListener
public class TrackScheduler extends com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.player.event.AudioEventAdapter
This class schedules tracks for the audio player. It contains the queue of tracks.

      Add the next track to queue or play right away if nothing is in the queue.

      force - If the track should be played right away.

    • nextTrack

      public void nextTrack(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.channel.unions.MessageChannelUnion textChannel, int position, boolean silent)
      Get the next Track from the Queue.
      Parameter:
      textChannel - the Text-Channel where the command have been performed from.
      position - the position of the track it should skip to. (relative to the current track)
      silent - should the bot send a message or not?

    • seekPosition

      Seek to a specific position in the current track.
      Parameter:
      channel - the Text-Channel where the command have been performed from.
      seekAmountInSeconds - the amount of seconds to seek to.

    • onTrackEnd

      public void onTrackEnd(com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.player.AudioPlayer player, com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.track.AudioTrack track, com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.track.AudioTrackEndReason endReason)
      Override the default onTrackEnd method, to inform user about the next song or problems.
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      onTrackEnd in Klasse com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.player.event.AudioEventAdapter
      Parameter:
      player - the current AudioPlayer.
      track - the current Track.
      endReason - the current end Reason.

      public void stopAll(net.dv8tion.jda.api.interactions.InteractionHook interactionHook)
      Stop every Song-Player on the Guild.
      Parameter:
      interactionHook - the InteractionHook, incase it is a SlashCommand.
      guild - The Guild entity.
